Upgrade to Pro and Unlock News Sitemaps: Upgrade to Pro and Unlock News Sitemaps
Do you get a blank sitemap or 404 error?: Do you get a blank sitemap or 404 error?
The Video Sitemap works in much the same: The Video Sitemap works in much the same way as the XML Sitemap module, it generates an XML Sitemap specifically for video content on your site. Search engines use this information to display rich snippet information in search results.
You can use this section to add any URLs: You can use this section to add any URLs to your sitemap which aren’t a part of your WordPress installation. For example, if you have a contact form that you would like to be included on your sitemap you can enter the information manually.
Organize sitemap entries into distinct f: Organise sitemap entries into distinct files in your sitemap. We recommend you enable this setting if your sitemap contains more than 1,000 URLs.
Enable this option to look for videos in: Enable this option to look for videos in custom fields as well.
Select which Post Types appear in your s: Select which Post Types appear in your sitemap.
Allows you to specify the maximum number: Allows you to specify the maximum number of posts in a sitemap (up to 50,000).
